_inspectorSnowReport.Report: Deer Valley has received 4 of snow in the last 24 hours. For real-time updates including terrain and chairlift openings, we encourage guests to download the <a href="https://www.deervalley.com/get-in-touch/mobile-app">Ikon Pass App</a> or explore the <a href="https://www.deervalley.com/explore-the-mountain/mountain-report">Mountain Report</a> on our website.
